body:
Oh, wait, looks like I actually broke the site if you try to visit it. @mythmon Can you review what I've added here while I fix it?

Edit: it's something to do with the `render_bundle`s in the html files. I will check that out and add a commit to fix them.

body_html:
Oh, wait, looks like I actually broke the site if you try to visit it. @mythmon Can you review what I've added here while I fix it?

Edit: it's something to do with the render_bundles in the html files. I will check that out and add a commit to fix them.
